properties.title: Pumptrack Magglingen
properties.abstract: High above Lake Biel on the property of the Swiss Federal Institute of Sport in Magglingen there is a wavy pump track facility for all non-motorised two-wheelers.
properties.description:
It is an asphalt track, designed as an endless loop. It follows lots of rollers and turns and the natural elements of the topography. The Magglingen pump track was built in 2019 and can be used with a mountain bike, BMX, kickboard, or skateboard.

When the facility is not reserved for a group, it is open to the public and suitable for both beginners and advanced riders. 


Surface: asphalt
properties.name: Bundesamt für Sport BASPO, Nationales Sportzentrum Magglingen
